movies.title: Genocyber
movies.plot: A nightmarish combination of cybernetics and psychic potential. At its core: the tortured souls of 2 human beings. Many desire to control this monstrosity, but can its hatred be contained? Battle erupts, and the cyberpunk world of the future is about to explode with violence!
movies.simplePlot: A nightmarish combination of cybernetics and psychic potential. At its core: the tortured souls of 2 human beings. Many desire to control this monstrosity, but can its hatred be contained? ...

biography.bio: Vincent Bagnall's movie debut was in MGM's 'Golden Gate' with Matt Dillon and Joan Chen, directed by John Madden ('Shakespeare In Love'). Vincent Bagnall Born in Springfield, Massachusetts, Vincent studied Drama at San Francisco State University where he earned a Bachelor of Arts degree. He trained classically at the Central School of Speech and Drama in London, England. Vincent began his theater career in Germany playing Tom in Tennessee Williams' 'The Glass Menagerie' and Jerry in Edward Albee's 'The Zoo Story.' He then moved to Massachusetts and performed in plays such as 'Lysistrata'; 'Hedda Gabler'; 'The Miss Firecracker Contest'; The Boor; and 'Henry IV,' directed by Austin Pendleton at the Williamstown Theater Festival. Venturing westward to California, he performed in 'Macbeth,' 'A Midsummer Night's Dream' and 'Measure For Measure' at Shakespeare & Company in San Francisco. His repertoire was further enriched as a member of the San Francisco Mime Troupe. After his stint in California, Vincent moved to New York where he played the lead male character opposite actress-playwright Pamela Sabaugh in the award-winning 'Woman in the Animal Kingdom' at the New York International Fringe Festival. Other New York credits include his portrayal of Malcolm in 'Macbeth'; Algernon in 'The Importance of Being Earnest'; Rosalind in the "switched-gender" casting of 'As You Like It'; and Butch in 'The Good Time Boys' at The Wings Theater. While working in New York, Vincent was cast in a national tour with Chamber Theater Productions of Boston playing Roderick in 'The Fall of the House of Usher, General Zaroff in 'The Most Dangerous Game' and Sam in 'The Ransom of Red Chief.' A talented voice-over artist, his extremely versatile voice has earned him numerous roles in feature animation such as 'MD Geist II,' 'Garzey's Wing' and 'Genocyber.' Vincent's extensive acting range landed him lead roles in Bernard and Doris, Tenderness, 'I, Traveller' and 'Fender Saves The World. TV appearances include 'Saturday Night Live,' and 'As The World Turns. In 2007, Vincent recorded a complete audio book of Treasure Island. From 2007 until 2010, Vincent Bagnall is working on a documentary about The Weimar Republic, which took place in Germany from 1918 until 1933.
biography.name: Vincent Bagnall

biography.bio: Louis Atlas is an actor, known for Genocyber (1994).
biography.name: Louis Atlas

biography.bio: David Berberian is an actor, known for Genocyber (1994).
biography.name: David Berberian

biography.bio: Colin Bruce is an actor, known for The Secret Garden (1993), Chariots of Fire (1981) and Gotham (1988).
biography.name: Colin Bruce

biography.bio: Shigeru Chiba was born on February 4, 1954 in Kumamoto, Japan as Masaharu Maeda. He is known for his work on Lamu (1981), Fist of the North Star (1984) and Ghost in the Shell (1995).
biography.name: Shigeru Chiba

biography.bio: Ben Coates is an actor, known for Genocyber (1994) and Garzey's Wing (1996).
biography.name: Ben Coates

biography.bio: Brian Driscol is known for his work on Genocyber (1994) and Garzey's Wing (1996).
biography.name: Brian Driscol

biography.bio: Masashi Ebara was born on May 4, 1953 in Yokohama, Japan. He is an actor, known for Naruto: Shippûden (2007), Perfect Blue (1997) and Naruto (2002).
biography.name: Masashi Ebara

biography.bio: Rosemary Elliot is an actress, known for Genocyber (1994).
biography.name: Rosemary Elliot

biography.bio: Eric Flynn was born on December 13, 1939 in Hainan Island, China as Eric William Flynn. He was an actor, known for Empire of the Sun (1987), The Silent Invasion (1962) and Ivanhoe (1970). He was married to Caroline Forbes and Fern Warner. He died on March 4, 2002 in Pembrokeshire, Wales.
biography.name: Eric Flynn

biography.bio: Akiko Hiramatsu was born on August 31, 1967 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Bubblegum Crisis (1987), Hellsing (2001) and My Neighbor Totoro (1988).
biography.name: Akiko Hiramatsu

biography.bio: Keith Howard is an actor, known for Maze (1997), Patlabor: The Mobile Police (1989) and Genocyber (1994).
biography.name: Keith Howard

biography.bio: Masako Katsuki was born on October 15, 1959 in Hachinohe, Japan as Masako Shiono. She is an actress, known for Naruto: Shippûden (2007), Naruto (2002) and Appleseed (1988).
biography.name: Masako Katsuki

biography.bio: Seizô Katô was born on February 14, 1927 in Tokyo, Japan. He was an actor, known for Tokyo Godfathers (2003), Vampire Hunter D (1985) and Blitzkrieg Squadron Changeman (1985). He was married to Setsuko. He died on January 17, 2014 in Itabashi, Tokyo.
biography.name: Seizô Katô

biography.bio: Shira Kirshner is an actor, known for Genocyber (1994) and Adventure Kid (1993).
biography.name: Shira Kirshner

biography.bio: John Knox is known for his work on Iron Man (2008), Star Trek (2009) and Inspector Gadget (1999).
biography.name: John Knox

biography.bio: Pamela Merrick is an actress, known for Seiden RG Veda (1992), Genocyber (1994) and The Heroic Legend of Arislan (1991).
biography.name: Pamela Merrick

biography.bio: Stuart Milligan was born on September 10, 1953 in Boston, Massachusetts, USA. He is an actor, known for Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow (2004), Spy game - Jeu d'espions (2001) and Outland (1981).
biography.name: Stuart Milligan

biography.bio: Rachael Nanstad is an actress, known for Genocyber (1994).
biography.name: Rachael Nanstad

biography.bio: Kumiko Nishihara was born on April 27, 1965 in Kanagawa, Japan. She is an actress, known for Gwendoline (1988), Sakura Wars (1997) and Moldiver (1993).
biography.name: Kumiko Nishihara

biography.bio: Masayuki Omoro was born on March 6, 1948 in Ishikawa, Japan. He is an actor, known for Appleseed (1988), Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood (2009) and Cerberus (2016).
biography.name: Masayuki Omoro

biography.bio: Raised in Oregon and northern California. Attended Del Norte High School, Crescent City, California. Acted and directed at the Oregon Shakespearean Festival, Ashland, Oregon, from 1963 to 1972. BA (Theatre Arts), Humboldt State College, Arcata, California (1967). Diploma in Drama, University of Manchester, UK (1969). UK resident since 1969. Credits include stage work, voice work, television, radio and film.
biography.name: William Roberts

biography.bio: Toshiharu Sakurai was born on July 3, 1964 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Nadia: The Secret of Blue Water (1990), Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Legend of the Supermutants (1996) and Dragon League (1993).
biography.name: Toshiharu Sakurai

biography.bio: Toshihiko Seki was born on June 11, 1962 in Tochigi, Japan. He is an actor, known for Naruto (2002), Ninja Scroll (1993) and Castle in the Sky (1986).
biography.name: Toshihiko Seki

biography.bio: Kaoru Shimamura was born on April 15, 1969 in Kanagawa, Japan as Hiroko Takahashi. She was an actress, known for Moldiver (1993), Bastard!! (1992) and Genocyber (1994). She died on February 26, 2013 in Yokohama, Kanagawa.
biography.name: Kaoru Shimamura

biography.bio: Emi Shinohara was born on August 8, 1963 in Nagano, Japan as Emiko Shinohara. She is an actress, known for Ninja Scroll (1993), Perfect Blue (1997) and Appleseed (2004).
biography.name: Emi Shinohara

biography.bio: Kazuyuki Sogabe was born on April 16, 1948 in Chiba, Japan. He was an actor, known for Vampire Hunter D (1985), Dragon Ball Z: Bardock - The Father of Goku (1990) and Bubblegum Crisis (1987). He died on September 17, 2006 in Japan.
biography.name: Kazuyuki Sogabe

biography.bio: Kôji Tsujitani was born on April 26, 1962 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Inuyasha (2000), Mobile Suit Gundam F91 (1991) and InuYasha: The Final Act (2009). He has been married to Kumiko Watanabe since July 2012.
biography.name: Kôji Tsujitani

biography.bio: Norio Wakamoto was born on October 18, 1945 in Yamaguchi, Japan as Noriaki Wakamoto. He is known for his work on Metropolis (2001), Ninja Scroll (1993) and Dragon Ball Z (1989).
biography.name: Norio Wakamoto

biography.bio: Kôsei Yagi is an actor, known for Blue Submarine No. 6 (1998), Genocyber (1994) and Sosei kishi Gaiasu (1992).
biography.name: Kôsei Yagi

biography.bio: Tamio Ôki was born on January 2, 1928 in Tokyo, Japan as Tamio Ooki. He is an actor, known for Ghost in the Shell (1995), Ghost in the Shell 2: Innocence (2004) and Les enfants loups, Ame & Yuki (2012).
biography.name: Tamio Ôki
